array: Western Sydney Wanderers - MacArthur: Rookie Win?

In the first round of the Australian A-League, the newcomer of the division, MacArthur, will face off against Western Sydney Wanderers. Note that both rivals represent Sydney, another derby has appeared in the A-League. As for the exposed line, "BC" is quoted as a small favorite.

Western Sydney Wanderes: bottom of the table team

Western Sydney finished 9th in the 2019/20 A-League regular season, only higher than the Central Coast Mariners and Melbourne Victory. In 26 games "VS" scored 33 points, won 9 matches with six draws and 11 defeats, 35:40 goal difference. If it hadn't been for two defeats in the last three games to Perth Glory and Western United, it is quite possible that we would have seen the future home team in the playoffs. And so the "wanderers" were forced to end the season after the regular season. Western Sydney Wanderers' home statistics were 7th in the league, with five wins in 13 matches, 4 draws and 4 losses. The home team has 30 players on its list, more than any other club in the A-League. In terms of cost, the hosts have the fifth squad in the division. Note that Pirmin Schwegler ended his football career, Jurman, Majvski, Lopar and Sullivan left the bast. Lesiotis, Ibini-Isei, Gordon, Dorrans and Troisi joined the ranks of the team.

MacArthur: newcomer to the Australian elite

Despite the fact that MacArthur is a newcomer to the elite division, the future guests have the most expensive squad in the A-League. MacArthur has 25 footballers in their bid, the total cost of which is estimated at 10.10 million euros. On average, each player on the team “costs” 404 thousand euros, also the highest in the division. Ante Milicic has two well-known players in his cage, Markel Susaeta and Benyat Echebarria. For MacArthur, the upcoming game will be the first official in the history of the club. Naturally, the guests will do everything possible so that the first pancake, as they say, does not become lumpy.

Manchester United - Wolverhampton: betting on Manchester United's labor victory

Form "MU"

Man United dropped to fourth after a missed 2-2 win over Leicester and Everton's victory over Sheffield. And also the unbeaten run of the “red devils” lasted up to eight games in a row, in which six victories were won. Manchester United conceded goals in five of them, and conceded first in four of them.

Plus, United impresses with their high performance - 21 goals scored in the last 8 games. And also "Man United" does not forget to concede 10 goals in 8 rounds. Manchester United have a great offensive roster, allowing them to play on two fronts. Fernandes, Rashford, Martial and James started the match against Leicester. Cavani, Greenwood, Pogba and Van de Beck can presumably enter the game with the "wolves" at the start. And it is also possible that Solskjaer will not keep Bruna in reserve.

Wolverhampton uniform

Wolverhampton have been quite volatile this season, although the Wolves have been deprived of their European Cup load this season. The reason for this drawdown is the departure of Matt Doherty to Tottenham, whose departure cannot make up for Nelson Semeda. And also the trauma of Raul Jimenez, whose presence on the field is sorely lacking, hit the wolves' capabilities. Therefore, the Wolves combine a victory over Chelsea with a defeat at Burnley. The defeat from the latter was blocked by a strong-willed draw with Tottenham (1: 1). "Wolves" once again reminded how uncomfortable they are for the giants. And at the same time, Wolverhampton's standings are not the highest - 11th place in the Premier League, which is natural.

Injured and disqualified

Manchester United: Rojo, Jones, Romero, Lindelof, James, Wan-Bissaka (questionable)
Wolverhampton: Jimenez, Dendoker, Honny

Meeting history

Wolverhampton and Manchester United have met 105 times. The score of personal meetings is 49:36 in favor of Manchester United. But recent face-to-face meetings do not often add up to the more titled MU. The last face-to-face meeting at Old Trafford in the Premier League ended in a draw (0: 0), as well as the first round match at Molinho (1: 1).

In January last season, the teams met twice in the FA Cup. The first match at Molinho ended in a goalless draw, although the wolves seriously threatened the guests throughout the match. Thus, both teams were forced to go to find out the winner of the confrontation at Old Trafford, where luck smiled at the Red Devils. As a result - 1: 0, Manchester United advanced to the next round thanks to a goal from Juan Mata.

Important facts about the match

Man United have never lost to Wolverhampton in their last 9 face-to-face meetings at Old Trafford
Manchester United have scored at least 2 goals per game in five of their last six games
United's unbeaten streak in the Premier League is eight games in a row
Manchester United played a clean sheet with Wolverhampton in the last three face-to-face meetings

Barcelona - Eibar: Catalans will cope with an outsider even without Messi

Eibar footballers have never beat Barcelona in the entire 12-match history of the face-to-face confrontation. Will Jose Luis Mendilibar's charges interrupt such an unsuccessful streak by defeating the Catalan club, which will play without Lionel Messi? Our prediction: even without the captain, the “blue-garnet” ones will gain an easy three points!

Barcelona team uniform

Barcelona is gradually starting to get out of the middle of the standings, where it ended up after a weak start of the championship. In the last four meetings, Ronald Koeman's wards have not suffered a single defeat, which in itself is their best segment of the season, so also during this period they won three victories and once drew with Valencia - 2: 2. All this allowed the Catalans to go for a week pause in the championship on the fifth line in the standings of Examples, and after this break they will leave without their captain Lionel Messi, who continues to recover.

Team uniform "Eibar"

“Eibar” is a typical middle peasant of the Spanish Example, who has never finished in the elite division above tenth place, while avoiding relegation to Segunda every time. It is this goal that the "gunsmiths" will pursue even now, since they finished the starting segment of the championship only in 17th place, ahead of the relegation zone by only one point. They poorly entered the season, gaining only one point in four rounds, but followed by an excellent segment, during which they suffered only one defeat in nine games. Before the holidays, Jose Luis Mendilibar's charges lost to Real Madrid and Alaves, which obviously did not add to their positive emotions.

The history of the head-to-head meetings between Barcelona and Eibar

In the framework of the Spanish Example, the teams held 12 personal meetings with each other. The Catalan club has 11 victories, and once a draw was recorded. The goal difference is also on the side of the “blue garnet” - 41: 6. Last season, the rivals met twice, and both times the victory was celebrated by the Barcelona players - 3: 0 and 5: 0.

Professional bets and predictions

Eibar is a very convenient opponent for Barcelona. The Catalan club in the entire 12-match history of the head-to-head confrontation only once drew with the "gunsmiths", and managed to win all the other games, and in most cases the outcomes were devastating, and last year they defeated them - 3: 0 and 5: 0. The guests are not in the best condition for the upcoming match, having lost two matches in a row, while the Catalans, on the contrary, gained a good move and began to gain points at last. Even without their captain, the “blue garnet” should win easily, and bet on Barcelona's victory with a handicap (-1.5) can be made with a coefficient of about 2.05.

Eibar this season has a very decent statistics on the reliability of defense, as in 15 matches they conceded only 15 goals (1.00 per game on average). For example, Barcelona itself in 14 meetings allowed to hit their goal 14 times (1.00 on average per game). It should be noted that the "gunsmiths" have not yet played against the "blue-garnet", and this inevitably spoils all the statistics, since in 12 personal meetings the Catalans scored 41 goals against Eibar (3.42 on average per game) ... Based on this, the best option for forecasting is the individual total of Barcelona over 2.5 goals with a coefficient close to 2.25.

Barcelona will face the upcoming clash without two of their top scorers: Lionel Messi and Anssu Fati continue their recovery. The third most productive player of the Catalan club is Antoine Griezmann, for whom there is a great chance to come out of the shadow of his partners and finally prove himself. Now the French striker has three goals in the current season, which clearly cannot suit him, so he must use this opportunity, which gives reason to look closely at the rate on the goal of Antoine Griezmann with a coefficient of about 2.15.

PSG - Strasbourg: Parisians easily take three points

PSG - Strasbourg prediction 23 December 2020: bets and odds on the match of Ligue 1

The rich program of the 17th round of the French football championship will end with a match in Paris, where the local PSG will host Strasbourg. Thomas Tuchel's wards have lost the first line in the standings and now intend to regain the leadership in the championship.

PSG: missed the lead in the championship

The Parisians continue to slip in the domestic championship and after a draw with Lille (0: 0), they dropped to the third line of the French championship. In the last five matches, PSG have only two wins, one defeat and two draws.

The team conducts home matches confidently, being also on the third line in this indicator. In eight home games, five wins were won, one draw was played. Twice at Parc des Princes, the Parisians had to capitulate: in the match with Marseille (0: 1), when PSG's squad suffered from losses, and then in the recent match with Lyon, which beat the already combat-ready team of Thomas Tuchel.

The Blues still score the most in the league: 35 goals scored with ten conceded - the best figure in the current league, which speaks of PSG's effective attacking line.

As for personnel losses, the following players will definitely not help the hosts due to injuries: Icardi, Bernat, Danilo, Dialo, Kimpembe, Sarabia, Florenzi, as well as Neymar, who suffered an ankle injury. The participation of Kurzawa is questionable.

Strasbourg: scores decently, but concedes more

Strasbourg interrupted their unbeaten streak of four matches and were defeated by Bordeaux (0: 2) in the last round. It has not yet been possible to completely secure oneself from the relegation zone and is unlikely to succeed in the next match.

On the road, the team does not play very confidently, but they managed to win the last two away matches. The victims were Angers (2: 0) and Nantes (4: 0). It is noteworthy that Strasbourg did not concede a single goal in these matches, although the team's defense is one of the worst, having conceded 27 goals in 16 games (an average of 1.68 goals per game). The work on establishing defensive actions is definitely underway, which cannot but rejoice. In the attack, things are much better and 22 goals scored is a direct confirmation of this. For comparison, the conditional "Marseille" scored only 21 goals.

The team was also not spared from injuries, and Kamara, Kone, Motiba, Saadi and Sels will not be able to help in the upcoming fight.

History of personal meetings PSG - Strasbourg

Throughout their history, the teams have played 57 matches. PSG celebrated victory in 29 matches, while Strasbourg was better in 11 matches. There were also 17 drawn matches. The goal difference is 79:51.

Match betting and predictions

PSG win with handicap (-1.5)

After the match with Lorient (2: 0), where the Parisians were supposed to score much more, the odds for a confident victory for the hosts grew slightly, which plays into our hands in this game. Even in spite of all the injuries and hardships of the hosts, the individual skill of the remaining footballers should be enough to confidently score three points from Strasbourg. You can bet on the victory of PSG with a difference of two goals in BC Fonbet, with a coefficient of 1.77.

First half: PSG win

I think that the hosts will get down to business already in the first half of the meeting, without leading to nervous endings and other surprises. Betcity BC estimates the victory of PSG in the first 45 minutes with a coefficient of 1.75.

Goal of Moise Keene

The talented Italian striker plays excellently in the wings of Mbappe, and in the absence of Neymar, who was injured, he will have more freedom of action than usual. BC Winline estimates Keane's goal with odds of 2.00.
AS Monaco - Saint-Etienne: the teams will play a grassroots draw

AS Monaco - Saint-Etienne prediction 23 December 2020: bets and odds for Ligue 1 match:

The program of the 17th round of the French Football Championship will continue with an interesting match between Monaco and Saint-Etienne. Monegasques managed to end their streak of three defeats, but will Niko Kovacs' men be able to beat Saint-Etienne?

AS Monaco: a small gaming crisis:

Monegasques finally won the last round, but beat the worst team in the championship - Dijon. In the last five matches, Monaco have three defeats and two wins. In the standings the team is on the seventh line with 26 points and has not yet lost the chances to break into the group of leaders.

At home, Monaco play very confidently: only one defeat (in the recent match with Lens - 0: 3), one draw and five wins. According to this indicator, Monegasques are in second place in Ligue 1, behind only Lyon. There were 18 goals scored in home matches, and 11 conceded.

As for personnel losses, we will definitely not see Lecomte and Fabregas, but the participation of Alexander Golovin is a big question.

Saint-Etienne: will fight for every point:

Claude Puel's wards slowed down a little their fall to the bottom of the standings, not losing for five matches and gaining seven points in this segment. Such results helped to break away from the relegation zone by six points and to be in 14th place in the standings.

Away, the team is not so confident, gaining only eight points in eight games. In total, two victories were won on the road, two draws were played and the team lost four times. The Greens scored eight goals in these matches, and conceded 13.

With injuries at “Saint-Etienne” is still tight. Da Silva, Maccon and Muffek will not help in the upcoming fight. The participation of Monne-Paquet and Retsos is questionable. Ruffier is disqualified.

Draw:

Monaco is experiencing a slight decline and so far only wins over weak opponents. Saint-Etienne is the most inconvenient team for the Monegasques. The Greens fight to the last to protect themselves from relegation, grope for their game, while Monaco, although they look more masterful, are experiencing great difficulties in realizing their chances. Stuttgart - Freiburg: will the auto plants take revenge?

One of the matches of the 1/16 finals of the German Cup will be the derby of Baden-Württemberg. In the 2020/21 season, opponents have already crossed paths in the first round of the German Bundesliga. That fight was won by "Freiburg" with a score of 3: 2. Moreover, the "Brazilians" during the match were leading in the score 3: 0, but let the opponent on the minimum distance. Now, "Stuttgart" has the opportunity to take revenge for the failure in the championship, for "Avtozavodtsev" the upcoming match is of great importance.

Stuttgart: cool newbie

Do not forget that Stuttgart, despite their titles and their historical significance, is just a newcomer to the German elite and even last season, Avtozavodtsy played in the 2.Bundesliga. After playing 13 rounds in 2020 in the Bundesliga, Stuttgart are in seventh position, behind Union, located in the Europa League zone, by only three points. As a newcomer to the elite, a very decent result. However, it is worth paying attention to the fact that the "auto plants" are still much better on the road than at the "Mercedes-Benz Arena". At home, “Stuttgart” has 0 wins with four draws and two defeats, 9:12 goal difference. The statistics are weak, however, the lack of home victories should only further motivate the future home team to win the derby.

Freiburg: Brazilians played out for the New Year

After a 3-match losing streak in November, Freiburg played five matches in which they drew twice with 3 wins, with Streich's 3-match winning streak continuing. The Brazilians beat Arminia, Schalke and Hertha one after another in the German championship, scoring eight goals and one conceded ball during this period. Thanks to such a victorious spurt, Freiburg moved up to 10th place in the Bundesliga tournament. By the way, the “Brazilians” are only one point behind “Stuttgart”. On the road, Freiburg, as for the middle peasant, has good statistics, in six games they wins two draws and two defeats with a goal difference of 7:11.

Injured and disqualified

Stuttgart: not playing - Ailton, Al-Gaddioui, Avuja, Gral, Mola, Tommy.

Freiburg: not playing - Flecken, Haberer, Itter, Keitel, Thiede.

Tentative lineups

Stuttgart: Male - Mavropanos, Anton, Kempf - Endo, Sosa - Wamangttuka, Mangala - Castro, Didavi - Gonzalez.

Freiburg: Müller - Gulde, Schlotterbeck, Lienhart - Kübler, Santamaria, Höfler, Gunter - Höhler, Grifo - Demirovich.

Personal meeting history

Freiburg and Stuttgart have played 41 times between, + 24 = 5-12, 75:53 goal difference. On the field in Stuttgart, the opponents met 20 times, + 14 = 3-3, 43:22. Also, pay attention to the fact that directly in the German Cup, "auto plants" and "Brazilians" crossed four times, + 2 = 1-1 in favor of "Stuttgart".

Angers - Marseille: southerners to beat worst home team of the season

Lyon - Nantes: the weavers will continue their successful streak

Lyon - Nantes prediction 23 December 2020: bets and odds for the match of Ligue 1:

The rich program of the 17th round of the French Football Championship will continue with a match between Lyon and Nantes. “Weavers” together with “Lille” topped the League 1 standings. Will Rudy Garcia's wards be able to gain a foothold at the top and outrun the “dogs”?

Lyon: in great shape:

The “Weavers” gained a phenomenal form, not losing for 14 matches in a row in League 1. The only defeat to Lyon was given to Montpellier (1: 2), already in September of this year. Rudy Garcia's charges have 33 points, but Lille is still higher in additional indicators.

Lyon have yet to be defeated at home with four wins and three draws in seven games. The “weavers” conceded six goals and scored 16. However, in terms of points scored in home matches (15 points), this is only the fifth result in League 1. Even Brest is higher in this indicator (16 points).

As for personnel losses, Lyon's infirmary is empty and all players will be able to take part in the upcoming match. There are also no disqualified players.

Nantes continues to fall to the bottom of the table:

The Canaries have been unable to win in seven Ligue 1 games, with just four points in that period. Such results contributed to the fall to the 15th line of the French championship standings. Everton form:

Sao Paulo: Are the future champions ?:

Unlike Gremio, São Paulo has long been knocked out of international tournaments, focusing on domestic ones. The Brazilian Cup is a priority for the "tricolor", "Sao Paulo" is the only big team in the Brazilian metropolis that has never won this tournament. Let us remind you that Corinthians won this trophy in 2009, and Palmeiras in 2012 and 2015. We also draw attention to the fact that if Gremio won only once in the last five games, then Sao Paulo has four victories during this period, including over Atletico Mineiro, direct competitors in Brasileirao. “Sao Paulo”, in addition to reaching the Cup semi-finals, is the leader of the Brazilian Championship after 26 played rounds. On the road, the "tricolor" has the second statistics in the league after "Flamengo", in 13 games six wins with 4 draws and three defeats, 22:15 goal difference.
